title: Search Literature for a Predictive Biomarker
description: A translational scientist is searching for a potential predictive biomarker that could identify patients most likely to respond to a new drug.

tasks.description: Formulate a search query for literature databases (e.g., PubMed) combining the drug's mechanism of action and the disease indication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive search query.

tasks.description: Execute the search and screen the results for papers discussing biomarkers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent screens the abstracts and identifies several papers that mention potential genetic biomarkers.

tasks.description: Synthesize the findings from the relevant papers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the evidence, noting that a mutation in the 'GENE-Y' is consistently associated with response in similar drugs.

tasks.description: Generate a report recommending that 'GENE-Y' mutation status be explored as a biomarker in the next clinical trial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report with a clear recommendation for the clinical team.
